0110010000010011 1101100111100100 1 -> sum: 0011110111111000, cout: 1
1010000100101010 0011010111101001 0 -> sum: 1101011100010011, cout: 0
1100001010101100 1110010111010110 0 -> sum: 1010100010000010, cout: 1
1110100111100101 1011000001010011 1 -> sum: 1001101000111001, cout: 1
0010111011101010 0010111000100110 0 -> sum: 0101110100010000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
